summary:
Grandpa Pepe - Grandpa Pepe is the endearing and sage-like ​elder of the Pepe the Frog meme family. Originating from the popular “Boys Club” comic series by Matt Furie, Grandpa Pepe represents a wiser, older, and often more humorous take on the beloved character. With his gray hair, glasses, and gentle smile, he embodies the nostalgic and comforting presence of a grandparent who has seen it all and has the wisdom to share.

  -
